name: Jill Stingray Listens to your Drunk Ramblings and does the Stanky Leg
name_original: Jill Stingray Listens to your Drunk Ramblings and does the Stanky Leg
description:
Welcome to VA-11 HALL-A, but we're lazy and don't want to infringe copyright so we call it "Vallhallabar"

After a bad day you decide to go outside, walk around aimlessly and breathe some fresh air, at least as fresh as nanomachine-infested air is, when you find a small bar down an alleyway. Thinking drowning your sorrows in alcohol is a good idea, you step in and sit down on the counter, where a bartender greets you. Will you open up your life to her? And there's no other option so you will have to 'fess up.

hope calling this a fangame is enough to let me get away with things also if there's typos it's intended it adds to the charm yea haha i barely tested this

also i think windows doesn't like long names so change the folder name to something short and maybe put it at the root of the drive or smth

Credits

  • Me: most things
  • Hello, spagnips and the third unnamed weeb with 1000 hours on visual novels: information on how long visual novels of this kind tend to last
  • Fish: listened to me ramble about how i hate videogames
  • That one Virtual YouTuber: made me laugh
